name: 于治平
objective:
Introduction to basic instruments, knowledge of electronic components. 
Diode circuit: rectification, filtering, limiting and clamping, and zener diode.
Operational amplifier: inverting and non-inverting, arithmetic circuit, voltage follower, integration and differentiation, instrument amplification.
Transistor: characteristics, biasing, various amplifier configurations. 
Frequency response of amplifiers, multi-stage and cascade amplifiers, differential amplifiers, feedback amplifiers, power amplifiers, astable, monostable, and bistable oscillators, signal generation circuits, voltage regulator circuits.
schedule:
Week01: Introduction
Week02~03: Instruments Teaching
Week04~06: Diode Circuits
Week07~09: Bipolar Junction Transistor Circuits
Week10~12: Field Effect Transistor Circuits
Week13~17: Operational Amplifier Circuits
Week18: Final Examination
materials:
Textbook:
Electronic Devices and Circuit Theory,Tenth Edition
Authors:Robert L. Boylestad & Louis Nashelsky,
Publisher:Pearson Education, Inc
